pERCEPTOR::

"Personaly I would rather that that happen"replied calmed 
Perceptor"Come on Swichtblade, why will I challenege the great 
decepticon who destroy Megatron???? Haven't you noticed that I'm 
blind????? How can I challenge you great power?"

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "x_rauq_x" <x_rauq_x@y...> wrote:
> -- Switchblade / Astrotrain --
> 
> Switchblade shakes his head, "We shall see... He'll decide that for 
> himself." Smiling, he turns and faces the door as Perceptor enters.
> 
> "Welcome Perceptor," Switchblade motions for the bot to sit in an 
> unmolested chair across the room. "Remember that one false move 
will 
> result in Firestrike strategicly placing his gun beside your head, 
> and pulling the trigger." He mock shudders, "We wouldn't want 
> anything like that to happen, would we."
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., gunthers@t... wrote:
> > Firestrike steps forward as he waits for Perceptor to come 
through 
> > the door into the control room.  He stands to the side of the 
> door.  
> > "Will reprogrammation be needed on this one?" he asks calmly but 
> > loyaly.
